text: Brynjar Aa (born 21 July 1960) is a Norwegian writer and playwright. == His books == * 1981 Tjukken - youth book * 1982 Gord's children - novel * 1983 Babyboy - novel * 1986 Clæsh - play * 1987 Pinball ; Clæsh ; Syx – three dramas * 1999 Trondheim or The evangelical, adventurous and slightly crazy story about a trip to NidaRus incl. Epilogue - audio play * 1999 Schlappz – novel Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian playwrights
title: Brynjar Aa
